links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Vladimir Kruchinin, D. V. Kruchinin, Composita and their properties , arXiv:1103.2582
formula: a(n) = n! * sum(k^(n-k-1) * (-1)^(k+1)/(n-k)!, k=1..n). - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Sep 07 2010
